title: Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Course Using Active Blended Learning (ABL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Knowledge and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: ABL (Activity-Based Learning)-based math education course combining theory and practice for current practitioners. Project-based assessment conducted in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in ABL (Activity-Based Learning) environments.
Learners can achieve over 90% of weekly learning objectives through blended learning modules, improving self-directed learning abilities.
Learners can fully integrate ABL principles into real-world work scenarios by completing team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
